#https://www.econometrics-with-r.org/10-3-fixed-effects-regression.html

```{r}
library(plm)
library(xts)
```


```{r}
dhistfe1 <- dhist1 %>% ungroup(urlsolid)
dhistfe1$createdxts <- make.time.unique(dhistfe1$createdxts)
dhistfe1$id <- seq.int(nrow(dhistfe1))
dhistfe1$createdxtsid  <- paste(dhistfe1$createdxts, dhistfe1$id, sep="_")
dhistpanel1 <- pdata.frame(dhistfe1, index = c("urlsolid", "createdxtsid"), drop.index = TRUE)
anchorfe <- plm(amount ~ histavg, 
                    data = dhistpanel1, 
                    model = "within")
summary(anchorfe)
texreg(anchorfe)
```

#use the Hausmann test phtest to determine whether fixed effects or random effects
